General.Name: LFTD Partners Inc
General.Description: LFTD Partners Inc., through its subsidiary, Lifted Made, manufactures and sells hemp-derived cannabinoid products, and psychoactive and alternative lifestyle products under the Urb Finest Flowers and Silly Shruum brands. It also sells its products through www.Urb.shop website. The company was formerly known as Acquired Sales Corp. and changed its name to LFTD Partners Inc. in September 2021. LFTD Partners Inc. was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Jacksonville, Florida.
General.Address: 14155 Pine Island Drive, Jacksonville, FL, United States, 32224
